text: Fatemeh Rakeei () is an Iranian politician, linguist, poet and Alzahra University faculty. Rakei was born in Zanjan, Zanjan Province. She was a member of the 6th Islamic Consultative Assembly from the electorate of Tehran. Now she is the secretary-general of population Muslim women modernity. ==References== Category:People from Zanjan, Iran Category:Iranian Azerbaijani politicians Category:Living people Category:University of Tehran alumni Category:Tarbiat Modares University alumni Category:Iranian Azerbaijani poets Category:Iranian Azerbaijani linguists Category:1954 births Category:Deputies of Tehran, Rey, Shemiranat and Eslamshahr Category:Members of the 6th Islamic Consultative Assembly Category:Islamic Iran Participation Front politicians Category:Union of Islamic Iran People Party politicians Category:Members of the Women's fraction of Islamic Consultative Assembly Category:Association of the Women of the Islamic Republic politicians Category:Iranian Shia Muslims Category:Ethnic Azerbaijani Shia Muslims Category:21st-century women politicians Category:Secretaries-General of political parties in Iran
title: Fatemeh Rakeei
